solution_line_template: The dress was ${dress_price} and {discount_percent_value}% off so {dress_price}*{discount_percent_decimal} = $<<{dress_price}*{discount_percent_decimal}={discount_amount}>>{discount_amount} discount price
The dress cost ${dress_price} minus ${discount_amount} (30% off discount) so {dress_price}-{discount_amount} = $<<{dress_price}-{discount_amount}={final_cost}>>{final_cost}
